#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include <fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<stack>
#include<cstring>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<queue>  
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1000000007
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
	int T;
	int i,n,t;
	int themax,themin;
	cin>>T>>n;
	while(T--)
	{
		themax=0;
		themin=100;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>t;
			themax=max(themax,t);
			themin=min(themin,t);
		}
		cout<<themax-themin<<endl;
	}
	//system("pause");
	return 0;
}
